attributes.action: Bullying we're coming to get you- (make cyber bullying illegal)
attributes.additional_details:
Take the Bullying we're coming to get you pledge.
Support a victim and make your mark against bullying.
We want justice for those who gave their life away because they were cyber bullied. We want justice for those who have been cyber bullied. This is a petition that will become a voice for all victim of cyber bullying.
Every signature we collect will support a Victim.
If you don't agree with cyber bullying,
If you want to help victims.
Then Sign our petition and Make Your Stand.
